User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://parasparkash.github.io/sitemap.xml

# Disallow admin and private areas
Disallow: /_site/
Disallow: /_posts/
Disallow: /_layouts/
Disallow: /_includes/
Disallow: /_data/
Disallow: /_notes/
Disallow: /Gemfile
Disallow: /Gemfile.lock
Disallow: /node_modules/
Disallow: /vendor/

# Allow important files
Allow: /assets/
Allow: /feed.xml
Allow: /sitemap.xml

# Crawl delay (optional)
Crawl-delay: 1
